Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by reducing unnecessary suggestions when autocomplete is not wanted.

Added_Other.name: FFlagInternalExportHandleMisnamedR15Bones
Added_Other.mechanism: Addresses issues with incorrectly named R15 character bones during export processes.

Added_Other.name: FFlagISREarlyFilterAnimatedJoints
Added_Other.mechanism: Enables early filtering of animated joints in the game engine.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves performance by reducing unnecessary calculations for animated parts.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppAddSchemaFieldsToGameClicks
Added_Other.mechanism: Adds additional data fields to game click events in Lua scripts.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances the ability to track player interactions, helping developers understand player behavior.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToPymkCarouselClicks
Added_Other.mechanism: Adds sorting data to the clicks on the carousel in the Lua app.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the organization of recommended items, making it easier for players to find what they like.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppAddSortDataToSocialCarouselClicks

Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the backend systems to better support older Lua applications.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves compatibility and performance for older games, enhancing the player experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppFixSearchTextBoxWidth
Added_Other.mechanism: Corrects the width of the search text box in the Lua application interface.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves usability by ensuring the search box is appropriately sized for better accessibility.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppRecommendedGamesCollectionCarousel

Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to discover new games through a visually appealing format.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOnTileHoverWithHiddenMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Displays the age rating of a game when players hover over its tile, even if some metadata is hidden.
Added_Other.purpose: Informs players about the game's suitability for different age groups, promoting safer gaming experiences.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuaAppSupportEmptyStringFooterMetadata
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows applications to handle empty string metadata in Lua scripts.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves app functionality and user experience by supporting more flexible data handling.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauOccursCheckInCommit
Added_Other.mechanism: Integrates occurrence checks into the commit process for code execution.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances code reliability, leading to smoother gameplay and fewer bugs.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves type checking in Luau by refining types in union scenarios.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances code safety and reduces errors for developers, leading to a smoother gameplay experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation
Added_Other.mechanism: Moves the display of empty results to a new foundational system.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides a more consistent and user-friendly experience when no results are found.

Added_Other.name: FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Restricts modal dialogs to only appear over visible frames.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves user experience by ensuring modals don't appear unexpectedly.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Staged

Added_Other.purpose: Improves the visual layout of text in games, making it look better and easier to read.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2
Added_Other.mechanism: Collects and sends performance data to a new telemetry system.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousWake
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves the way performance data is collected by filtering out unnecessary wake events.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides more accurate performance metrics, leading to smoother gameplay experiences.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Staged

Added_Other.name: FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm
